languages.text: "Они посмели изгадить память Леди Теодоры! Надеюсь, что их гнилые душонки сейчас терзают все демоны варпа".
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
languages.original_text: "Они посмели изгадить память Леди Теодоры! Надеюсь, что их гнилые душонки сейчас терзают все демоны варпа".

traits.locale_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! There is no forgiving that. I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! There is no forgiving that. I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! There is no forgiving that. I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! There is no forgiving that. I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
"They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

languages.text: "Sie haben es gewagt, Lady Theodoras Andenken zu schänden! Ich hoffe, alle Dämonen im Warp reißen gerade an ihren verfaulten Seelen."
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben es gewagt, Lady Theodoras Andenken zu schänden! Das kann man unmöglich vergeben." Ich hoffe, alle Dämonen im Warp reißen gerade an ihren verfaulten Seelen."

languages.text: « Ils ont osé profaner la mémoire de dame Théodora ! À l'heure où nous parlons, j'espère que tous les démons du Warp sont en train de se repaître de leurs âmes corrompues. »
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont osé profaner la mémoire de dame Théodora ! C'est impardonnable. À l'heure où nous parlons, j'espère que tous les démons du Warp sont en train de se repaître de leurs âmes corrompues. »

languages.text: «¡Se han atrevido a profanar el recuerdo de lady Theodora! Espero que los daemons de la disformidad les estén desgarrando sus inmundas almas».
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se han atrevido a profanar el recuerdo de lady Theodora! Eso no tiene perdón. Espero que los daemons de la disformidad les estén desgarrando sus inmundas almas».

languages.text: 「彼らはシオドーラ様の思い出を汚した！<歪み>の悪魔が今頃、腐った魂に爪を立てていることを願うわ」
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはシオドーラ様の思い出を汚した！それは許されることではないわ。<歪み>の悪魔が今頃、腐った魂に爪を立てていることを願うわ」

languages.text: “他们竟敢玷污西奥多拉夫人的遗骨！我希望亚空间的恶魔现在就扯烂他们腐烂的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

traits.locale_text: “他们竟敢玷污西奥多拉夫人的遗物！这种行为无法原谅，我希望亚空间的恶魔现在就扯烂他们腐烂的灵魂。”

languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."

languages.text: "Ne cüretle Leydi Theodora'nın hatırasına saygısızlık ederler? Umarım öteboyuttaki tüm iblisler, o çürümüş ruhlarını kemiriyordur."
languages.original_text: "They dared defile Lady Theodora's memory! I hope all the daemons in the warp are clawing at their rotten souls right now."
